list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a competition between runners, horses, vehicles, boats, etc., to see which is the fastest in covering a set course.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi đã thắng cuộc đua 50 vòng đầu tiên

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a strong or rapid current flowing through a narrow channel in the sea or a river.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: angling for tuna in turbulent tidal races
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Angling cho cá ngừ trong các cuộc đua thủy triều hỗn loạn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a water channel, especially one built to lead water to or from a point where its energy is utilized, as in a mill or mine.
a smooth ring-shaped groove or guide in which a ball bearing or roller bearing runs.
each of the major groupings into which humankind is considered (in various theories or contexts) to be divided on the basis of physical characteristics or shared ancestry.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: people of all races, colors, and creeds
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: người dân tất cả các chủng tộc, màu sắc và tín ngưỡng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: compete with another or others to see who is fastest at covering a set course or achieving an objective.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the vet took blood samples from the horses before they raced
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: VET lấy mẫu máu từ những con ngựa trước khi chúng chạy đua

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: move or progress swiftly or at full speed.
